name: AdGroupUpdate
desc: The response to ad group update requests.

items.name: automatedKeywordsOptIn
items.desc: The parameter for enabling and disabling Search Match. If true, the system automatically adds optimized keywords in addition to those you explicitly add to the ad group.See the Enable and Disable Search Match section of Ad Groups.

items.name: cpaGoal
items.desc: The cost-per-acquisition goal.NoteYou can’t set the cpaGoal parameter when the pricingModel has a value of CPM.

items.name: defaultBidAmount
items.desc: The default maximum cost per tap/impression bid for the ad group.NoteThe defaultCpcBid field in API 3 and earlier is now the defaultBidAmount field in API 4.

items.name: endTime
items.desc: The scheduled end date and time for the ad group, which the system determines from the ad group with the latest end time.

items.name: name
items.desc: The unique name of the ad group. Responses donʼt include deleted ad groups.

items.name: startTime
items.desc: The scheduled start date and time for the ad group with the earliest start time in the campaign.

items.name: status
items.desc: The user-controlled status to enable or pause the ad group.

items.name: targetingDimensions
items.desc: The targeting criteria to narrow the audience. Targeting options include age, gender, geolocation, daypart, device, and app downloaders.
